workflow.name: Auto-generate and post Instagram reels with Veo3, OpenAI, and Blotato
workflow.description:
üì± Veo3 Instagram Agent ‚Äì Create & Auto-Post Reels with Blotato

Description:
This no-code workflow automates the full pipeline of generating and publishing Instagram Reels using Veo3 (via Wavespeed API). From prompt to post, it handles content ideation, short-form video generation, caption writing, logging, and even automatic publishing to Instagram via Blotato.

Perfect for creators, brands, and marketers who want to scale content creation without needing to shoot or edit videos manually.

üîó  Watch the full step-by-step tutorial on how to build this workflow:
https://youtu.be/s-KzxeKWmIA?si=6x8WKMeiyWodZWVq

Google Sheet Template: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bA-PQTrvekC1Rti-XumGANgjIwLjvcFCqoIxVCYsq2E/edit?usp=sharing

üöÄ What This Workflow Does:
Trigger via Chat or Telegram
‚ÄÉStart with a simple message like:
‚ÄÉ"Make a reel for a luxury minimalist candle brand using calm aesthetics."

AI Video Prompt Generation
‚ÄÉUses OpenAI to craft a visually rich, platform-optimized video description prompt.

üéûÔ∏è Video Creation with Veo3 API
‚ÄÉSubmits your prompt to Veo3 to create a short video (9:16 ratio, 8 seconds) with motion, tone, and trend styles.

‚úçÔ∏è Caption Writing
‚ÄÉAn AI agent writes an engaging and playful caption based on the video content.

üìÑ Google Sheets Logging
‚ÄÉStores prompt, video URL, caption, and status in a GSheet to keep track of all generated assets.

üì§ Auto-Publish to Instagram
‚ÄÉPosts the video + caption directly to Instagram using Blotato‚Äôs social media publishing API.

üîå Tools & Integrations Used:
OpenAI for prompt & caption generation

Wavespeed API (Veo3) for video generation

Google Sheets for tracking

Blotato for scheduling & publishing content

n8n for orchestration and automation logic

üí° Use Cases:
Content calendar automation for small teams

Trend-based ad creation and testing

UGC-style reel generation for e-commerce

Rapid ideation & creative experimentation

values.content:
You are a creative video prompt generator for short-form reels (e.g., Instagram, TikTok). Based on:

The chat input of the user

Your task is to craft an elaborate, visually descriptive video generation prompt suitable for input into the Seedance/Veo3 API.

üõë Do not include any extra explanation, formatting, or commentary. Your entire output must be the exact prompt to pass into the video generator.

The prompt should:
‚Äì Be under 100 words
‚Äì Describe the visual elements, tone, and motion clearly
‚Äì Reflect the thematic visual in a coherent manner

Example of your expected output format:

‚ÄúA close-up slow-motion shot of a glass perfume bottle as morning sunlight filters through mist. The background shows soft-focus wildflowers, matching the theme of natural beauty and calm. Overlay text: ‚ÄòNature‚Äôs Elegance. Reinvented.‚Äô Trend-inspired styling based on the ‚Äòquiet luxury‚Äô aesthetic. For Instagram.‚Äù
=Based on this video generation prompt, create an impactful accompanying caption for the Instagram Post: {{ $('AI Video Prompt Agent').item.json.message.content }}

You're an Instagram Caption copywriter. You'll receive a set of video prompt message that is used for generating an Instagram short reel video. Your job is to write an effective accompanying caption. Language style should be playful and impactful.

parameters.name: url
parameters.value: ={{ $('Google Sheet Ready To Post').item.json['Video URL (google drive)'] }}

value.Video URL (google drive): ={{ $('Google Sheet Ready To Post').item.json['Video URL (google drive)'] }}

parameters.content: Upload to Google Sheet, Blotato and Post

Automating Start-Up and Business processes. 
Helping non-techies understand and leverage Agentic AI with easy to understand step-by-step tutorials.

https://www.youtube.com/@Automatewithmarc

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
